remarks: Derive ~ ax-11o from a hypothesis in the form of ~ ax-11 .  The hypothesis is even weaker than ~ ax-11 , with ` z ` both distinct from ` x ` and not occurring in ` ph ` .  Thus the hypothesis provides an alternate axiom that can be used in place of ~ ax11o .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)
statement:
ax11a2.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( A. z ph -> A. x ( x = z -> ph ) ) ) $.
ax11a2 $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
$d ph z $.
$d x z $.
$d y z $.
